requirements.summary: Update AdminLogin.tsx to submit password exactly as typed and pre-fill email field with athiakash1977@gmail.com
acceptanceCriteria: Entering email `athiakash1977@gmail.com` and password `Akash@8667099605` on the Admin Login page and clicking Submit successfully authenticates and redirects to `/admin/dashboard`.
The email input field has placeholder or pre-filled value `athiakash1977@gmail.com`.
An incorrect password still shows the existing error message without crashing.

file_operations.description: Update the login form to ensure password is submitted exactly as typed without any transformation (no trimming, no toLowerCase, no normalization). Set the email input field's defaultValue or placeholder to `athiakash1977@gmail.com`. Verify that the form submission passes raw email and password values directly to the verifyAdminCredentials mutation without any modification. Ensure error handling remains intact for invalid credentials.
